ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp

Class ExpenseList

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp.ExpenseList

  • public class ExpenseList
extends Object
    Stores a list of Expenses along with a set of listeners to be updated whenever the list is modified.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExpenseList()
      Create a new empty ExpenseList

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(Listener listener)
      Add a new listener to be updated whenever this ExpenseList is changed.
      ArrayList<Expense> getExpenses()
      Returns the stored expenseList Array
      void removeListener(Listener listener)
      Remove a listener so that it will no longer be updated when this ExpenseList is changed.
      void setExpenseList(ArrayList<Expense> expenseList)
      Set the stored expenseList, will automatically update listeners and save the list once saving is implemented.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • ExpenseList

        public ExpenseList()
        Create a new empty ExpenseList

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        public void addListener(Listener listener)
        Add a new listener to be updated whenever this ExpenseList is changed.
        Parameters:
        listener - a listener object

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(Listener listener)
        Remove a listener so that it will no longer be updated when this ExpenseList is changed.
        Parameters:
        listener - a listener object

      • getExpenses

        public ArrayList<Expense> getExpenses()
        Returns the stored expenseList Array
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Expenses.

      • setExpenseList

        public void setExpenseList(ArrayList<Expense> expenseList)
        Set the stored expenseList, will automatically update listeners and save the list once saving is implemented.
        Parameters:
        expenseList - An ArrayList of Expenses.
